title: Constantin Kabemba
text: Constantin Kabemba (born 1 June 1943) is a former <a href="Democratic%20Republic%20of%20the%20Congo">Congolese</a> <a href="cycle%20sport">cyclist</a>. He competed in the <a href="Cycling%20at%20the%201968%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20individual%20road%20race">individual road race</a> and the <a href="Cycling%20at%20the%201968%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20team%20time%20trial">team time trial</a> events at the <a href="1968%20Summer%20Olympics">1968 Summer Olympics</a>.
